question: Which programming language is primarily used to develop WordPress?
What is a theme in WordPress?
What is the purpose of a WordPress plugin?
options: To add functionality to a WordPress site
To create backups of the website
correctAnswer: To add functionality to a WordPress site

question: Which of the following is the default database management system used by WordPress?
What is the WordPress Dashboard?
options: The front-end of a WordPress site
The control panel for managing a WordPress site
correctAnswer: The control panel for managing a WordPress site

question: What is the purpose of the WordPress shortcode?
options: To add custom functionality to posts and pages
correctAnswer: To add custom functionality to posts and pages

question: What is the function of the WordPress function 'wp_head()'?
options: To insert scripts and styles into the head section of the HTML document
To create a new WordPress user
correctAnswer: To insert scripts and styles into the head section of the HTML document

question: What is the default permalink structure in WordPress?
What is the role of the WordPress administrator?
options: To manage the content of the website
To install WordPress themes and plugins
To have full control over the WordPress site
correctAnswer: To have full control over the WordPress site
